profiles.name: Alex P. Wick ✓
profiles.summary:
Head of Sales & Marketing @ LEADxperience 🧲✓ | #MrLXP | End-to-End Lead Management: From Identification to Closing Deals | Better Leads. Bigger Wins. All LXP. | 💬 🇩🇪 & 🇺🇸 | +49 155 61621070 | leadxperience.de · 𝑰 𝑨𝑴 𝑨𝑳𝑬𝑿 – Your Partner in Smarter Sales and Marketing Success

With 20 years of global experience, I’ve worn many hats: engineer, strategist, marketer, and now, Head of Sales & Marketing at LEADxperience (LXP). From mastering Print & Media Technologies to redefining sales, my career is about one thing: turning potential into measurable success.

Today, I’m "Mr. LXP" – the face of a SaaS platform that doesn’t just identify leads; it transforms them into actionable opportunities.

𝑾𝒉𝒂𝒕 𝑫𝒓𝒊𝒗𝒆𝒔 𝑴𝒆?

➤ 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐁𝐞𝐲𝐨𝐧𝐝 𝐁𝐨𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬: I design solutions that empower businesses of all sizes to expand across industries and reach new markets global

profiles.name: Oliver Obeth
profiles.summary: Head of Sales Excellence · Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the automotive and manufacturing industry. Enable the team to drive towards excellence. Powerful individual in project management and optimizing process flows. Always strive for high usability in applications. Highly skilled to lead the transformation in the industry with deep knowledge for IT applications and the integration in daily use. Strengths in data analysis with the focus on the big picture with dedicated passion to contribute for the success for the company. · Experience: ElringKlinger · Education: IU International University of Applied Sciences · Location: Stuttgart Region · 500+ connections on LinkedIn. View Oliver Obeth’s profile on LinkedIn, a professional community of 1 billion members.
